issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Remove Nested from expression enum
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10704](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10704). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Remove Nested from expression enum. It's not needed and never produced/used.

comments.body:
